  <title>
   Documenta Catholica Omnia - Multilanguage Catholic E-Book Database of all the Writings of Holy Popes, Councils, Church Fathers and Doctors, and Allied Auctors
  </title>
  <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type"/>
  <meta content="e-book database, multilanguage full texts and concordances, catholic and classic writers, Greek Patristic, Latin Patristic" name="CLASSIFICATION"/>
  <meta content="Huge e-book database of multilanguage full texts, analytical indexes and concordances of catholic and classic authors" name="DESCRIPTION"/>

     <td>
      <b>
       Documenta Catholica Omnia
      </b>
     </td>

    <tr>
     <td>
      <b>
       Materia:
      </b>
     </td>
     <td>
      <b>
       Omnium Paparum, Conciliorum, Ss Patrum, Doctorum Scriptorumque Ecclesiae qui ab Aevo Apostolico ad usque Benedicti XVI Tempora Floruerunt
      </b>
     </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
     <td>
      <b>
       Argumentum:
      </b>
     </td>
     <td>
      <b>
       Conspectus Rerum Ratione Argumentorum Distributus Seu 'Index of Available Topics'
      </b>
     </td>
    </tr>
   </table>
   <table border="0">
    <tr>
     <td>
      <b>
       Sancto Alberto Magno Patrono Plorante ac Beata Semper Virgine Maria Intercedente, Spiritus Sancte, Veritatis Deus, Hunc Locum a Malo Defendere Digneris.
      </b>
     </td>
    </tr>
